GenericHeader.C

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /* Generic File Headers (SgAsmGenericHeader and related classes).  Describes a binary file header. Most binary files have at
00002  * least one header that serves as sort of a superblock for describing the rest of the file.  Many formats have more than one
00003  * header (e.g., Microsoft Windows files have both a DOS header and a PE header). */
00004 
00005 #include "sage3basic.h"
00006 
00012 void
00013 SgAsmGenericHeader::ctor()
00014 {
00015     set_synthesized(true);
00016     set_purpose(SP_HEADER);
00017 
00018     /* The bidirectional link between file and header */
00019     get_file()->add_header(this);
00020 
00021     /* Create child IR nodes and set their parent (initialized to null in real constructor) */
00022     ROSE_ASSERT(p_dlls == NULL);
00023     p_dlls    = new SgAsmGenericDLLList;
00024     p_dlls->set_parent(this);
00025 
00026     ROSE_ASSERT(p_exec_format == NULL);
00027     p_exec_format = new SgAsmGenericFormat;
00028     p_exec_format->set_parent(this);
00029 
00030     ROSE_ASSERT(p_sections == NULL);
00031     p_sections = new SgAsmGenericSectionList;
00032     p_sections->set_parent(this);
00033 }
00034 
00035 /* Destructor must remove header/file link. Children in the AST have already been deleted when called from
00036  * SageInterface::deleteAST() */
00037 SgAsmGenericHeader::~SgAsmGenericHeader() 
00038 {
00039     /* Deletion of section children should have emptied the list of header-to-section links */
00040     ROSE_ASSERT(p_sections->get_sections().empty() == true);
00041 
00042     /* Destroy the header/file bidirectional link. See comment in constructor. */
00043     ROSE_ASSERT(get_file()!=NULL);
00044     get_file()->remove_header(this);
00045 }
00046 
00048 bool
00049 SgAsmGenericHeader::reallocate()
00050 {
00051     bool reallocated = false;
00052     for (SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList::iterator i=p_sections->get_sections().begin(); i!=p_sections->get_sections().end(); ++i) {
00053         if ((*i)->reallocate())
00054             reallocated = true;
00055     }
00056     return reallocated;
00057 }
00058     
00060 void
00061 SgAsmGenericHeader::unparse(std::ostream &f) const
00062 {
00063     SgAsmGenericSection::unparse(f);
00064 
00065     /* Unparse each section */
00066     for (SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList::iterator i=p_sections->get_sections().begin(); i!=p_sections->get_sections().end(); ++i)
00067         (*i)->unparse(f);
00068 }

00072 rose_addr_t
00073 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_entry_rva() const
00074 {
00075     if (p_entry_rvas.size()==0)
00076         return rose_addr_t();
00077     return p_entry_rvas[0].get_rva();
00078 }
00079 
00081 void
00082 SgAsmGenericHeader::add_section(SgAsmGenericSection *section)
00083 {
00084     ROSE_ASSERT(section != NULL);
00085     ROSE_ASSERT(p_sections != NULL);
00086     p_sections->set_isModified(true);
00087 
00088 #ifndef NDEBUG
00089     /* New section must not already be present. */
00090     for (size_t i = 0; i < p_sections->get_sections().size(); i++) {
00091         ROSE_ASSERT(p_sections->get_sections()[i] != section);
00092     }
00093 #endif
00094     section->set_header(this);
00095     section->set_parent(p_sections);
00096     p_sections->get_sections().push_back(section);
00097 }
00098 
00100 void
00101 SgAsmGenericHeader::remove_section(SgAsmGenericSection *section)
00102 {
00103     if (section!=NULL) {
00104         ROSE_ASSERT(p_sections != NULL);
00105         SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList::iterator i = find(p_sections->get_sections().begin(),
00106                                                         p_sections->get_sections().end(),
00107                                                         section);
00108         if (i != p_sections->get_sections().end()) {
00109             p_sections->get_sections().erase(i);
00110             p_sections->set_isModified(true);
00111         }
00112     }
00113 }
00114 
00116 void
00117 SgAsmGenericHeader::add_dll(SgAsmGenericDLL *dll)
00118 {
00119     ROSE_ASSERT(p_dlls != NULL);
00120     p_dlls->set_isModified(true);
00121 
00122 #ifndef NDEBUG
00123  // for (size_t i = 0; i < p_dlls.size(); i++) {
00124     for (size_t i = 0; i < p_dlls->get_dlls().size(); i++) {
00125         ROSE_ASSERT(p_dlls->get_dlls()[i] != dll); /*duplicate*/
00126     }
00127 #endif
00128     p_dlls->get_dlls().push_back(dll);
00129 
00130     dll->set_parent(p_dlls);
00131 }

00134 SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList
00135 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_mapped_sections() const
00136 {
00137     SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList retval;
00138     for (SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList::iterator i=p_sections->get_sections().begin(); i!=p_sections->get_sections().end(); ++i) {
00139         if ((*i)->is_mapped()) {
00140             retval.push_back(*i);
00141         }
00142     }
00143     return retval;
00144 }

00147 SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList
00148 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_sections_by_id(int id) const
00149 {
00150     SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList retval;
00151     for (SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList::iterator i=p_sections->get_sections().begin(); i!=p_sections->get_sections().end(); ++i) {
00152         if ((*i)->get_id() == id) {
00153             retval.push_back(*i);
00154         }
00155     }
00156     return retval;

00160 SgAsmGenericSection *
00161 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_section_by_id(int id, size_t *nfound/*optional*/) const
00162 {
00163     SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList possible = get_sections_by_id(id);
00164     if (nfound) *nfound = possible.size();
00165     return possible.size()==1 ? possible[0] : NULL;
00166 }
00167 
00170 SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList
00171 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_sections_by_name(std::string name, char sep/*or NUL*/) const
00172 {
00173     if (sep) {
00174         size_t pos = name.find(sep);
00175         if (pos!=name.npos)
00176             name.erase(pos);
00177     }
00178 
00179     SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList retval;
00180     for (SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList::iterator i=p_sections->get_sections().begin(); i!=p_sections->get_sections().end(); ++i) {
00181         std::string secname = (*i)->get_name()->get_string();
00182         if (sep) {
00183             size_t pos = secname.find(sep);
00184             if (pos!=secname.npos)
00185                 secname.erase(pos);
00186         }
00187         if (0==secname.compare(name))
00188             retval.push_back(*i);
00189     }
00190     return retval;
00191 }

00194 SgAsmGenericSection *
00195 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_section_by_name(const std::string &name, char sep/*or NUL*/, size_t *nfound/*optional*/) const
00196 {
00197     SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList possible = get_sections_by_name(name, sep);
00198     if (nfound) *nfound = possible.size();
00199     return possible.size()==1 ? possible[0] : NULL;
00200 }
00201 
00203 SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList
00204 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_sections_by_offset(rose_addr_t offset, rose_addr_t size) const
00205 {
00206     SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList retval;
00207     for (SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList::iterator i=p_sections->get_sections().begin(); i!=p_sections->get_sections().end(); ++i) {
00208         SgAsmGenericSection *section = *i;
00209         if (offset >= section->get_offset() &&
00210             offset < section->get_offset()+section->get_size() &&
00211             offset-section->get_offset() + size <= section->get_size())
00212             retval.push_back(section);
00213     }
00214     return retval;
00215 }

00218 SgAsmGenericSection *
00219 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_section_by_offset(rose_addr_t offset, rose_addr_t size, size_t *nfound/*optional*/) const
00220 {
00221     SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList possible = get_sections_by_offset(offset, size);
00222     if (nfound) *nfound = possible.size();
00223     return possible.size()==1 ? possible[0] : NULL;
00224 }
00225 
00227 SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList
00228 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_sections_by_rva(rose_addr_t rva) const
00229 {
00230     SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList retval;
00231     for (SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList::iterator i = p_sections->get_sections().begin(); i!=p_sections->get_sections().end(); ++i) {
00232         SgAsmGenericSection *section = *i;
00233         if (section->is_mapped() &&
00234             rva >= section->get_mapped_preferred_rva() && rva < section->get_mapped_preferred_rva() + section->get_mapped_size()) {
00235             retval.push_back(section);
00236         }
00237     }
00238     return retval;
00239 }
00240 
00243 SgAsmGenericSection *
00244 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_section_by_rva(rose_addr_t rva, size_t *nfound/*optional*/) const
00245 {
00246     SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList possible = get_sections_by_rva(rva);
00247     if (nfound) *nfound = possible.size();
00248     return possible.size()==1 ? possible[0] : NULL;
00249 }
00250 
00255 SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList
00256 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_sections_by_va(rose_addr_t va, bool use_preferred) const
00257 {
00258     if (use_preferred) {
00259         if (va < get_base_va())
00260             return SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList();
00261         rose_addr_t rva = va - get_base_va();
00262         return get_sections_by_rva(rva);
00263     }
00264      
00265     SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList retval;
00266     for (size_t i=0; i<p_sections->get_sections().size(); i++) {
00267         SgAsmGenericSection *section = p_sections->get_sections()[i];
00268         if (section->is_mapped() &&
00269             va>=section->get_mapped_actual_va() && va<section->get_mapped_actual_va()+section->get_mapped_size())
00270             retval.push_back(section);
00271     }
00272     return retval;
00273 }

00280 SgAsmGenericSection *
00281 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_section_by_va(rose_addr_t va, bool use_preferred, size_t *nfound/*optional*/) const
00282 {
00283     SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList possible = get_sections_by_va(va, use_preferred);
00284     if (nfound) *nfound = possible.size();
00285     return possible.size()==1 ? possible[0] : NULL;
00286 }

00289 SgAsmGenericSection *
00290 SgAsmGenericHeader::get_best_section_by_va(rose_addr_t va, bool use_preferred, size_t *nfound) const
00291 {
00292     const SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList &candidates = get_sections_by_va(va, use_preferred);
00293     if (nfound) *nfound = candidates.size();
00294     return SgAsmGenericFile::best_section_by_va(candidates, va);
00295 }

00297 /* Print some debugging info */
00298 void
00299 SgAsmGenericHeader::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx) const
00300 {
00301     char p[4096];
00302     if (idx>=0) {
00303         sprintf(p, "%sHeader[%zd].", prefix, idx);
00304     } else {
00305         sprintf(p, "%sHeader.", prefix);
00306     }
00307     const int w = std::max(1, DUMP_FIELD_WIDTH-(int)strlen(p));
00308 
00309     SgAsmGenericSection::dump(f, p, -1);
00310 
00311     ROSE_ASSERT(p_exec_format != NULL);
00312     p_exec_format->dump(f, p, -1);
00313 
00314     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = 0x%x\n", p, w, "ins_arch", p_isa);
00315 
00316     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = \"", p, w, "magic");
00317     for (size_t i = 0; i < p_magic.size(); i++) {
00318         switch (p_magic[i]) {
00319           case '\\': fputs("\\\\", f); break;
00320           case '\n': fputs("\\n", f); break;
00321           case '\r': fputs("\\r", f); break;
00322           case '\t': fputs("\\t", f); break;
00323           default:
00324             if (isprint(p_magic[i])) {
00325                 fputc(p_magic[i], f);
00326             } else {
00327                 fprintf(f, "\\%03o", (unsigned)p_magic[i]);
00328             }
00329             break;
00330         }
00331     }
00332     fputs("\"\n", f);
00333 
00334     /* Base virtual address and entry addresses */
00335     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = 0x%08"PRIx64" (%"PRIu64")\n", p, w, "base_va", get_base_va(), get_base_va());
00336     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %zu entry points\n", p, w, "entry_rva.size", p_entry_rvas.size());
00337     for (size_t i = 0; i < p_entry_rvas.size(); i++) {
00338         char label[64];
00339         sprintf(label, "entry_rva[%zu]", i);
00340         rose_addr_t entry_rva = p_entry_rvas[i].get_rva();
00341         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = 0x%08"PRIx64" (%"PRIu64")\n", p, w, label, entry_rva, entry_rva);
00342         SgAsmGenericSectionPtrList sections = get_file()->get_sections();
00343         dump_containing_sections(f, std::string(p)+label, entry_rva, sections);
00344     }
00345 
00346     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %zu sections\n", p, w, "section", p_sections->get_sections().size());
00347     for (size_t i=0; i<p_sections->get_sections().size(); i++) {
00348         SgAsmGenericSection *section = p_sections->get_sections()[i];
00349         char label[1024];
00350         sprintf(label, "section[%zu]", i);
00351         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = [%d] \"%s\"\n", p, w, label, section->get_id(), section->get_name()->get_string(true).c_str());
00352     }
00353     
00354     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %zu entries\n", p, w, "DLL.size", p_dlls->get_dlls().size());
00355     for (size_t i = 0; i < p_dlls->get_dlls().size(); i++)
00356         p_dlls->get_dlls()[i]->dump(f, p, i);
00357 }
